original_text: Then the priests brought the Lord's Covenant Box to its proper place in the inside room of the temple. That was the Most Holy Place. They put it under the wings of the cherubs.
korean_text: 제사장들이 여호와의 언약궤를 자기의 처소로 메어 들였으니 곧 성전의 내소인 지성소 그룹들의 날개 아래라

sentences.original_text: Then the priests brought the Lord's Covenant Box
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제사장들이 주의 언약 궤를 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: in the inside room of the temple
That was the Most Holy Place
under the wings of the cherubs
